message_1: Simplify the logarithmic expression: log(25) + log(5) - log(2)
message_2:
Using the logarithmic properties, we can simplify the expression as follows:

log(25) + log(5) - log(2) = log(25 * 5) - log(2) = log(125) - log(2)

Now, we can use the quotient rule for logarithms:

log(a) - log(b) = log(a/b)

So, log(125) - log(2) = log(125/2) = log(62.5)

The simplified logarithmic expression is log(62.5).
